title: Black Widow

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Listen to. You hear everything that happens to them, learning their external notifications (ex: roleblocked, controlled, attacked). If they die, you learn their cause of death, even if they're cleaned.
- At night, choose to Harsh a player. You blackmail them and learn their faction. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player you listened to is visited by no one but you, it's quiet enough that you can hear their breath, and you'll learn who they visit.
- If your target is attacked and protected, you learned the role of the attacker and the defender.
- You learn if the player is under any status effects, including frames.
- You are not affected by frames.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
